activate.ChoosePassPhrase:
Kōwhiria he kīanga tuku hei takiuru.
He rerenga korero ngawari kei roto i etahi kupu ka ngawari ki te maumahara.
activate.ChoosePassPhraseSeeSuggestions: Kōwhiria he kīanga tuku pai hei tiaki i tō pūkete. Tirohia nga whakaaro mo etahi whakaaro.
activate.IfYouFeel: Mena ka whakaaro koe kua he tetahi, ka taea e koe

authorize.TermsLabel:
Kua panui ahau me te whakaae
ki te {{link}}
authorize.mustAgree: Tuatahi me whakaae koe ki nga tikanga.

notifications.title: Whakaaetanga
notifications.prompt: Kei te pirangi koe ki te whakahohe i nga whakamohiotanga? Ka whiwhi koe i nga korero whakamohiotanga mo nga mea e aro nui ana koe.
notifications.WelcomePleaseVerifyEmail: Nau mai haere mai! Tena koa manatokohia to wahitau imeera.
notifications.WelcomeVerifyEmail: Nau mai haere mai! Manatokohia to wahitau imeera.
notifications.ForgetPass: Hey, i wareware koe ki to kīangahipa?
notifications.CompletedActivation: Kua oti i a koe te whakahohe kaiwhakamahi.
notifications.CompletedActivationLogIn: Kua oti i a koe te whakahohe kaiwhakamahi. Ngana ki te takiuru inaianei.

login.title: Nau mai haere mai
login.resendConfirm: Kei te pirangi koe ki te tuku karere ki te tautuhi i to kīangahipa?
login.resendSuccess: Takina he karere hei tautuhi i to kupuhipa
login.noPassphrase: I mua i to urunga, me whakarite e koe he kupu whakawhiti ma te panui i te hono i to karere whakahohenga.
login.notVerified: Me tuku e koe he karere whakaoho kia taea ai te takiuru.
login.emailExists: I ngana koe ki te rehita me tenei imeera i mua? Ki te pera, tirohia to pouakaroto ki te whakahohe i to putea. Paatohia kia tukuna ano te karere
login.mobileExists: I ngana koe ki te rehita me tenei nama waea i mua? Ki te pera, tirohia to SMS ki te whakahohe i to putea. Paatohia kia tukuna ano te karere
login.newUser: hanga ranei he kaute hou i raro nei

placeholders.username: whakamahia nga reta me nga nama anake

login.confirmTerms: Whakaaetia nga Ture o te Ratonga?
login.facebookNoEmail: Kei te ngaro to putea facebook he wahitau imeera kua whakapumautia. Me takiuru noa i te huarahi taketake.
login.picTooltip: Ka taea e koe te huri i tenei pikitia i muri mai

alert.title: Ka anga ki te Pukoro
alert.content: Kia kati koe i tenei korero, ka haria koe ki to putea. Whai muri i to hainatanga, hoki mai ki tenei wharangi.

setIdentifier.title: Tāpirihia he huarahi ki te takiuru

placeholders.identifier: tomo to waea pūkoro #, imeera ranei

prompt.title: {{Platform}} Pūkete
prompt.noLongerUsing: Kua kore koe e hono atu ki a {{platform}} as
